price: I Mi to ostavismo kao znak – pa ima li ikoga ko bi se prisjetio?
arabic: وَلَقَد تَّرَكۡنَٰهَآ ءَايَةٗ فَهَلۡ مِن مُّدَّكِرٖ

version.title: Bosnian translation - Rowwad Translation Center
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Bosnian by Rowwad Translation Center with cooperation with Islamhouse.com

meta.transliteration: walaqad taraknāhā āyatan fahal min muddakirin
